title: How to track down a person if you know their name and the rough area of where they live - Quora

response.answer_text: There are plenty of “background check” websites that give you aggregate publicly available information about the person. With a name and zip code you can usually find all of their known addresses, date of birth, family members, etc.

Introduce yourself as their known acquaintance and people will drop you right in front of their house. Tell them you have come from a far place and don't know this area, most are helpful in nature.   Hope it helps.
